Package user

Class Sellers

java.lang.Object
user.Users
user.Sellers
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Sellers extends Users
A class that represents a seller user of the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sellers

      public Sellers()
      Creates a new seller with default attributes.

    • Sellers

      public Sellers(String username, String password, String name, String surname, String role)
      Creates a new seller with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the seller.
      password - The password of the seller.
      name - The name of the seller.
      surname - The surname of the seller.
      role - The role of the seller.

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      public void registerCustomer(Client client)
      Registers a new customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to be registered.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the customer is null

    • issueCustomerAccount

      public void issueCustomerAccount(Client client)
      Issues a customer account.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer for whom the account is issued.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the customer is null

    • changeCustomerProgram

      public void changeCustomerProgram(Client client, String program)
      Changes the customer program.
      Parameters:
      program - The new program for the customer.
      customer - The customer for whom the program is changed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the customer is null or if the program is null or empty

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks whether the seller object is valid or not. A seller object is considered valid if it has a non-null and non-empty username, a non-null and non-empty password, and a non-null and non-empty name and surname.
      Returns:
      true if the seller object is valid, false otherwise.
